name: Intruder
description: The ultimate spy-vs-guards simulator. Carefully sneak your way to the objective as Intruders or use the wide variety of tactical gadgets to trap your opponents as Guards. Intruder allows for stealth, teamwork, and environmental interactions never before seen in a multiplayer game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: 64-bit, 2 GHz or Faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 3000 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: 64-bit, 3 GHz or Faster Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 750 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
